name: Dinosaur Pairs Card Match Game
description:
A Must for Young Dinosaur Fans!

Dinosaur Pairs is a fun pairs game with cute and colorful character cards. In-game match sounds are also available in soundboard mode to be played to your dino-loving-heart's content.

With Dinosaur Pairs you get:
- A Dinosaur Pairs Video Game
- A Fun Soundboard

Great for kids and grown-ups to play alone or with friends. Who can complete a round the quickest? Or who, more importantly, has the best memory and can complete a round with the fewest tries? Get Dinosaur Pairs now to find out!
